subject: re:Need to buy drugs but don't know where?
body:
Dear valued member.
Good news from MyCanadianPharmacy. Spring discounts for all our customers. 
There is no need to purchase expensive American drugs. Buy Canadian products manufactured according to the same strict medical standards followed in the United States.

Great selection of pharmaceutical products.There are no risks of being scammed or receiving faked products. 
Best regards,Erling Cannon
